Uses of Class
ml.alternet.parser.Grammar.Match

  • Packages that use Grammar.Match 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.parser
    Allow to design grammar, parse input and generate a custom data structure.

    • Uses of Grammar.Match in ml.alternet.parser

      Methods in ml.alternet.parser that return Grammar.Match 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Grammar.Match Grammar.Match.asMandatory()
      Turn this match to a mandatory match, that is to say a mandatory is never empty.
      Grammar.Match Grammar.Match.asOptional()
      Turn this match to an optional match, that is to say an optional won't fail but is empty, which allow repeatable rules to avoid looping.
      abstract Grammar.Match Grammar.Rule.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler)
      Parse an input with this rule.
      Grammar.Match Grammar.Proxy.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      Grammar.Match Grammar.Optional.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      Grammar.Match Grammar.ZeroOrMore.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      Grammar.Match Grammar.AtLeast.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      Grammar.Match Grammar.AtMost.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      Grammar.Match Grammar.Bounds.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      Grammar.Match Grammar.Choice.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      Grammar.Match Grammar.Sequence.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      Grammar.Match Grammar.Token.parse(Scanner scanner, Handler handler) 
      static Grammar.Match Grammar.Match.valueOf(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Grammar.Match[] Grammar.Match.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
